wallet.keysDescription: Get keys for various activities and use them to open boxes, to build and upgrade buildings in your Chibi City
wallet.bonusesDescription: Bonus points are used in all activities in the app, you can farm them or get for playing games
wallet.raceDescription: RACE coin is the main token in the app that will be listed on CEX exchanges

points.title: Get more Bonus Points
points.description: You can get much more bonus points when you play Explorer game or participate in Battles in Million Run game

droid.title: Upgrade your Droid
droid.description: You can upgrade the stage of your droid by getting miles in Million Run game in the main app. Higher droid stage will give you more benefits and bonuses in games.

ninja.title: Spy Ninja
ninja.description: Soon you will be able to send your Ninja to other users to steal keys for boxes

game.subheader: In Radar game you can get more boxes and open them without keys later
game.description: In Radar game you can find many useful and interesting artefacts that will help you to improve your chibis and to win in battles against other players

case.header: Open Red box and get RACE coins
case.description: You can get the keys to open the box in Battles section or for completing tasks
case.openButton: Insert keys and open the box
case.openApprove: Do you really want to insert all the keys and open the
case.caseInfo: Get the keys for guessing the winner in Million Run battles, completing tasks and inviting friends

banner.description: Use the keys to open the boxes and get prizes

city.description: Develop your city and build buildings that will allow you to mine resources, create artifacts and much more

buildings.buildApprove: Do you really want to %s the %s?

warehouse.name: Storage
warehouse.fullDescription: All your resources will be stored in the warehouse
warehouse.upgrade: Upgrade your building to store more resources and products in the storage

mine.name: Mine
mine.fullDescription: Mine ore and minerals, they are used to build new buildings and produce artifacts

fights.description: Pump your chibi team and participate in every day battles vs other players

team.description: Collect different chibi and create the strongest dream team in Chibiverse

choose.description: The class of the car does not affect its performance. Choose the body you like best!

header.desert: In the current World Round, the race takes place in desert
header.track: In the current World Round, the race takes place at the race trackc
header.city: In the current World Round, the race takes place in city

description1.part1: to drive as much as possible
description1.part2: before the time runs out in order to take the best place in the World Round ranking and to get more

description2.text: If your car is not adapted to racing in this element, its performance will be reduced. Use tuning to drive as many miles as possible!

header.desert: Your car is built for racing in the Desert.
header.track: Your car is built for racing at the Race track
header.city: Your car is built for racing in the City

carTypes.description: If you race in other elements in the current World Round, your car's performance will be reduced. Use tuning to drive as many miles as possible!

pitStop.description: To continue the race you need to have fuel and good technical condition.

chibiBanner.description1: Build your own gas station and service station to fuel and fix your cars for free, as well as earn

friens.call: Invite your friends and get bonuses

info.title: How to get bonuses
info.shareDescription: Share your referral link with your friends
info.tellYourFriendDescription: Tell your friends about the simple actions they need to do to get you bonuses
info.activate1Description1: Your friend needs to start farming and get the first
info.activate2Description1: You get a bonus for an invited friend after your friend receives
info.activate2Description2: for guessing the winner in any battle in the Battle section

invite.premiumInviteHeader: Invite your friends with Telegram Premium

slide1.title: TheRun App
slide1.description: TheRun is a platform (super-app) with various games and competitions based on geolocation of users

slide2.title: Use any transport
slide2.description: With the app you can walk, ride rollerblades, scooters, bicycles, motorcycles and drive cars

slide3.title: One competition for different transports
slide3.description: A pedestrian competes with a driver and a cyclist competes with a motorcyclist in equal game conditions

slide4.title: “Million Run” game with interesting and simple mechanics
slide4.description: Just launch the game when you go out of your home, put your mobile in a pocket and get “miles” while moving on any transport

slide5.title: Build your own Chibiverse!
slide5.description: Build buildings, make a chibi team, craft artifacts and battle with other users

slide6.title:
Use our Telegram mini-app
and the main app TheRun
slide6.description: You can use this Mini App and download TheRun from the Google Play market or App Store for the full gaming experience

dailyCheck.description: Get more bonus points by completing daily tasks

dailyCombo.description: Find combo to earn bonus rewards

tasks.checkError: You have not completed the task yet

battles.header:
Battles of the day
in Million Run game

battle.errBetTooLate: You can make a choice when a new World Round begins
battle.pickApprove: Do you really want to choose

banner.header: Choose your favorite, wait for the victory and get a prize
banner.description: You can make a choice only during 12 hours after the start of the World Round which lasts for 26 hours

battles.info: Right now these users participate in a battles in Million Run game. You can also play battles in the main app!
